function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conflicting data on benzalkonium chloride efficacy against coronavirus at different concentrations and contact times.","Impact":"Ineffective disinfection of surfaces leading to potential transmission of coronavirus.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to resolve conflicting data and establish the most effective concentration and contact time for benzalkonium chloride against coronavirus.","Technologies":"Research and testing technologies for evaluating the efficacy of benzalkonium chloride against coronavirus.","People":"Healthcare workers, facilities management personnel, and the general public using disinfectants containing benzalkonium chloride.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and regulatory agencies."},{"Description":"Long persistence of coronaviruses on inanimate surfaces, up to 9 days at room temperature and 28 days at higher temperatures.","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission through contaminated surfaces, leading to potential outbreaks of coronavirus.","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning and disinfection of frequent touch surfaces in healthcare, public, and private settings to reduce viral persistence and transmission.","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, surface cleaning equipment, and cleaning agents for reducing viral persistence on surfaces.","People":"Facilities management personnel, cleaning staff, and the general public responsible for cleaning and disinfecting surfaces.","Owner":"Public health agencies, facilities management departments, and cleaning companies."},{"Description":"High transfer efficiency of viral load to hands from contaminated surfaces, with potential transfer to the face and mucous membranes.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection through hand-to-face contact, leading to potential spread of coronavirus.","Mitigation":"Promote hand hygiene practices, hand washing, and use of hand sanitizers to reduce the transfer of viral load to the face and mucous membranes.","Technologies":"Hand hygiene products, hand sanitizers, and public health campaigns for promoting hand hygiene practices.","People":"General public, students, healthcare workers, and individuals in communal environments.","Owner":"Public health agencies, educational institutions, and organizations promoting hand hygiene practices."}]}
